- Responsive grid layout with mobile accordion
- Update pricing structure per Acuity playbook v2
- Remove deprecated booking flow dependencies

- All hire options link directly to Acuity scheduler\"

_**User**_

Furthermore, I feel like how we've handled this C-Space, how we're handling the media is wrong because on desktop where you have more width, it's not adjusting. The screen where the media is playing is literally half on desktop. It doesn't look good. I'll send you a screenshot of that as well. 
Another thing as well, I want us to be able to open the Acuity page as a full page model but still on the website. So they don't feel like they've been taken somewhere else, like they still feel that they're within the branding and everything that we've been doing. Because I think before we had a full page model as well, we weren't just taking them to an Acuity page. We were opening that Acuity page within our system. 
I feel that we can use progressive disclosure or a better UX pattern to make the studio higher option section better. It doesn't really make sense in terms of flow that you have the C space button, a little gap, and then it takes you there. You may as well just have a button which is like "scroll down". Obviously, it needs to look different on mobile and on web because on web scrolling down is scrolling with your mouse, but on mobile it's with your thumb. I don't know how you wanna show that, but go ahead.

+ # üîπ **Major UX Improvements - June 28, 2025**
+ 
+ ## **Fixed Issues** ‚úÖ
+ 
+ ### **1. Video Section Responsive Issues**
+ - **Problem**: Desktop videos were using mobile aspect ratios (9:16), appearing very narrow on wide screens
+ - **Solution**: Implemented responsive aspect ratios:
+   - Mobile: `aspect-[9/16]` (portrait for mobile viewing)
+   - Medium screens: `aspect-[16/9]` (standard landscape)  
+   - Large screens: `aspect-[4/5]` (optimal for desktop viewing)
+ - **Layout**: Changed from strict 2-column to responsive `md:grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2`
+ 
+ ### **2. Acuity Booking Experience**
+ - **Problem**: Users were taken away from branded site to Acuity directly
+ - **Solution**: Implemented modal booking system:
+   - All "Book Now" buttons open Acuity in branded modal
+   - Users stay on hibiscusstudio.co.uk throughout booking process
+   - Professional modal header with Hibiscus Studio branding
+   - Full-size iframe for complete Acuity experience
+   - Escape key and click-outside to close modal
+ 
+ ### **3. "See Space" Button UX Flow**
+ - **Problem**: Awkward flow with generic button pointing to content below
+ - **Solution**: Implemented progressive disclosure:
+   - Smooth scroll functionality instead of anchor jump
+   - **Desktop**: Animated down arrow with "Scroll to explore" text
+   - **Mobile**: Animated pulse dots with "Tap to see videos below"
+   - Different visual indicators for mouse vs touch interaction
+ 
+ ## **Technical Implementation** üõ†Ô∏è
+ 
+ ### **Modal System**
+ ```javascript
+ function openBookingModal(url) {
+   const modal = document.getElementById('bookingModal');
+   const iframe = document.getElementById('bookingFrame');
+   iframe.src = url;
+   modal.classList.remove('hidden');
+   document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
+ }
+ ```
+ 
+ ### **Smooth Scrolling**
+ ```javascript
+ function smoothScrollToSpace() {
+   document.getElementById('see-space').scrollIntoView({ 
+     behavior: 'smooth',
+     block: 'start'
+   });
+ }
+ ```
+ 
+ ### **Responsive Video Classes**
+ ```html
+ <div class="aspect-[16/9] lg:aspect-[4/5]">
+   <iframe>...</iframe>
+ </div>
+ ```
+ 
+ ## **All Booking Links Updated** üìÖ
+ 
+ ‚úÖ Event Half-Day (10-5/5-11): `appointment/79362536`  
+ ‚úÖ Event Full-Day (10AM-10PM): `appointment/79453733/calendar/12272135`  
+ ‚úÖ Event Full-Day + Late (10AM-11PM): `appointment/80167908/calendar/12355763`  
+ ‚úÖ Workshop Hourly (Weekdays): `appointment/80163988/calendar/12260380`  
+ ‚úÖ Workshop Full-Day (Weekends): `appointment/80164478/calendar/12272135`

+ ‚úÖ Content Peak Weekend (10-12): `appointment/80163518/calendar/12260380`  
+ ‚úÖ Studio Viewing (Tue 2-4): `appointment/80164274/calendar/12260380`

+ ## **Files Updated** üìÅ

- see space button still there. pls remove not what we have "scroll down"

- **Explicit element references** instead of dynamic string building
